You have to update your driver if you are getting the rage has stopping working error. I actually purchased the retail version and even the retail version crashes. I installed the first update too, and it still crashes. You have to download and install "amd_catalyst_rage_performance_driver." It has nothing to do with the pirated copy, with the rip, repack, or crack. Too bad trying to install that driver crashed my computer, leading to a blue screen of death and a system restore/startup recovery. I actually have to take my laptop down to Best Buy to get tech support. Hopefully, they will be able to install the driver for me. It is sad that the actual retail copy of Rage doesn't work out of the box for many people. That is simply inexcusable.
This game lags so much. Just wondering if there's a fix for the stuttering. Every other game works on my PC with no problems. But this game lags like every second.

I have higher than the specifications that you listed, but this game still doesn't run properly. After the patch, I managed to fix the endless lagging. But then there's the problem of missing, and mixed textures. What the hell, id Software? Seriously?

@piyush91 

i think you need to update your open gl
@viroh - It has nothing to do with my computer's specifications! The game is just, well, broken.

Nevermind. I fixed the problem. The missing textures were the result of Catalyst AI Texture filtering. If anyone else has this problem AFTER applying the hotfix, try switching between performance and quality under Catalyst AI Texture filtering options for their graphics card.
